short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a Google Image search result for the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search, find, and read the content you want with Daily Bible Page. No more hassle having to subscribe to dozens of websites or having to visit multiple sites everyday. Daily Bible Page brings you the best Christian content everyday, simply by opening your Chrome browser.
